short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight extension that simply adds the endonym to the country on every Google search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension in which it now shows the endonym for every country.

If you don't see an endonym it either means two things:
Not available (Georgia)
Spelling is the same as the endonym (ie: United States of America, United Kingdom)
